hi: how can I test my HD's performance?
to test with harddrive cache ON and with cache OFF
do I need to replace the T with anything?
you can run only -t or only -T and try it like that or -tT to test them both.
-T   perform cache read timings  and  -t   perform device read timings
or just use 'sudo hdparm --help' or 'man hdparm' for more information.
